description: Repository hygiene and documentation clarity for v0.1.0+

tasks.intent: Create CHANGELOG.md with release history starting from v0.1.0

guidelines: Follow Keep a Changelog format (https://keepachangelog.com)
Sections: Added, Changed, Fixed
Keep entries concise (1-2 lines each)
Include: risk_classifier refactor, test suite 51/51, golden set 10/10
Explain three-layer architecture: control/, work/, core/
control/ = cycle runner, gates, quality gate, auditor (immutable surface)
work/ = agent policies, improvement proposals, task execution
core/ = shared (axioms, self, metrics, risk_classifier)
One-way dependency: work → core ← control (work never imports control)
Include diagram (ASCII art acceptable)
Explain why: prevents autopoiesis from corrupting judges

tasks.intent: Create CONTRIBUTING.md with PR-first workflow and REVIEW tag system

guidelines: Explain PR-first autonomous cycle workflow
Quality Gate G6: deterministic (no LLM), 100% golden set accuracy
Three outcomes: PASS → PR, REVIEW → Issue, REJECT → logged
REVIEW tags: HS1-HS2 (surface area), R1-R10 (rules)
Golden set: 10 test cases (5 PASS, 5 REJECT) must maintain 100%
How to add new rules: update golden set first, then G6 logic
Protected files: control-plane files cannot be modified by autonomous cycles
Testing: 51/51 tests must pass before merge
